content:
Got it! Here's an updated version of the shift rotation sheet for GM social media agents with 7 agents and 4 shifts as follows: "8 am till 4 pm - 12 pm till 8 pm - 4 pm till 12 am - 12 am till 8 am":

Shift Rotation Sheet for GM Social Media Agents

|  | 8 am - 4 pm | 12 pm - 8 pm | 4 pm - 12 am | 12 am - 8 am |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Week 1 | Agent 1 | Agent 2 | Agent 3 | Agent 4 |
| Week 2 | Agent 5 | Agent 6 | Agent 7 | Agent 1 |
| Week 3 | Agent 2 | Agent 3 | Agent 4 | Agent 5 |
| Week 4 | Agent 6 | Agent 7 | Agent 1 | Agent 2 |

Note: This rotation is for a 4-week period, with each agent working one shift per day and one day off per week. You can adjust the duration of the rotation and the number of days off per week based on your team's specific needs.
